trans-unit.source: Advantageous Proclamation
trans-unit.target: 昭告先机

trans-unit.resname: CNS·1 | Advantageous Proclamation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)\nYour minimum deck size is reduced by five.
trans-unit.target: （开始游戏时将此诡局牌面朝上地置于统帅区。） 你的套牌张数下限减少五张。

trans-unit.source: "The beneficent council deems you worthy of favor. They hope this doesn't provoke envy from your peers."
trans-unit.target: 「议会念善，特准你占优越之势。冀此不至招致妒羡。」

trans-unit.source: Backup Plan
trans-unit.target: 后备计划

trans-unit.resname: CNS·2 | Backup Plan | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)\nDraw an additional hand of seven cards as the game begins. Before taking mulligans, shuffle all but one of your hands into your library.
trans-unit.target: （开始游戏时将此诡局牌面朝上地置于统帅区。） 于游戏开始时，额外抓一份七张牌的手牌。进行再调度前，留下其中一份手牌，并将其余的洗回你的牌库。

trans-unit.source: "In the market for an alternative, friend?"
trans-unit.target: 「在物色替代品吗，伙计？」

trans-unit.source: Brago's Favor
trans-unit.target: 布莱戈的恩惠

trans-unit.resname: CNS·3 | Brago's Favor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name a card. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen name.)\nSpells with the chosen name you cast cost {1} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: 秘案（开始游戏时此诡局牌面朝下地置于统帅区，并私下决定一个牌名。你随时可以将此诡局翻回正面并公布该名称。） 由你施放且具有该名称的咒语减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.source: Double Stroke
trans-unit.target: 双重击打

trans-unit.resname: CNS·4 | Double Stroke | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name a card. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen name.)\nWhenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell with the chosen name, you may copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.
trans-unit.target: 秘案（开始游戏时此诡局牌面朝下地置于统帅区，并私下决定一个牌名。你随时可以将此诡局翻回正面并公布该名称。） 每当你施放一个具有该名称的瞬间或法术咒语时，你可以复制之。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.source: Immediate Action
trans-unit.target: 事不宜迟

trans-unit.resname: CNS·5 | Immediate Action | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name a card. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen name.)\nCreatures you control with the chosen name have haste.
trans-unit.target: 秘案（开始游戏时此诡局牌面朝下地置于统帅区，并私下决定一个牌名。你随时可以将此诡局翻回正面并公布该名称。） 由你操控且具有该名称的生物具有敏捷异能。

trans-unit.source: Iterative Analysis
trans-unit.target: 反复分析

trans-unit.resname: CNS·6 | Iterative Analysis | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name a card. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen name.)\nWhenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell with the chosen name, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 秘案（开始游戏时此诡局牌面朝下地置于统帅区，并私下决定一个牌名。你随时可以将此诡局翻回正面并公布该名称。） 每当你施放一个具有该名称的瞬间或法术咒语时，你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Muzzio's Preparations
trans-unit.target: 穆奇奥的整备

trans-unit.resname: CNS·7 | Muzzio's Preparations | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name a card. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen name.)\nEach creature you control with the chosen name enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 秘案（开始游戏时此诡局牌面朝下地置于统帅区，并私下决定一个牌名。你随时可以将此诡局翻回正面并公布该名称。） 每个由你操控且具有该名称的生物进战场时上面额外有一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Power Play
trans-unit.target: 权力争斗

trans-unit.resname: CNS·8 | Power Play | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)\nYou are the starting player. If multiple players would be the starting player, one of those players is chosen at random.
trans-unit.target: （开始游戏时将此诡局牌面朝上地置于统帅区。） 你是先手牌手。如果有多位牌手将为先手牌手，则从中随机选择一位。

trans-unit.source: Secret Summoning
trans-unit.target: 隐秘召唤

trans-unit.resname: CNS·9 | Secret Summoning | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name a card. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen name.)\nWhenever a creature with the chosen name enters the battlefield under your control, you may search your library for any number of cards with that name, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 秘案（开始游戏时此诡局牌面朝下地置于统帅区，并私下决定一个牌名。你随时可以将此诡局翻回正面并公布该名称。） 每当一个具有该名称的生物在你操控下进战场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻任意数量具有该名称的牌，展示这些牌，将它们置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·10 | Secrets of Paradise | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Secrets of Paradise
trans-unit.target: 天堂奥秘

trans-unit.resname: CNS·10 | Secrets of Paradise | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name a card. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen name.)\nCreatures you control with the chosen name have "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
trans-unit.target: 秘案（开始游戏时此诡局牌面朝下地置于统帅区，并私下决定一个牌名。你随时可以将此诡局翻回正面并公布该名称。） 由你操控且具有该名称的生物具有「{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。」

trans-unit.source: Sentinel Dispatch
trans-unit.target: 速遣哨兵

trans-unit.resname: CNS·11 | Sentinel Dispatch | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)\nAt the beginning of the first upkeep, put a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token with defender onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: （开始游戏时将此诡局牌面朝上地置于统帅区。） 在第一个维持开始时，将一个1/1无色，具守军异能的组构体衍生神器生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: "Unusual. Security also worth stealing."\n—Dack Fayden
trans-unit.target: 「真少见。就连守卫都值得一偷。」 ～戴克费登

trans-unit.source: Unexpected Potential
trans-unit.target: 意外潜能

trans-unit.resname: CNS·12 | Unexpected Potential | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Hidden agenda (Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name a card. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen name.)\nYou may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast spells with the chosen name.
trans-unit.target: 秘案（开始游戏时此诡局牌面朝下地置于统帅区，并私下决定一个牌名。你随时可以将此诡局翻回正面并公布该名称。） 你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来支付施放具有该名称之咒语的费用。

trans-unit.source: Worldknit
trans-unit.target: 联世妙想

trans-unit.source: (Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)\nAs long as every card in your card pool started the game in your library or in the command zone, lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
trans-unit.target: （开始游戏时将此诡局牌面朝上地置于统帅区。） 只要你牌池中的所有牌游戏开始时均在你的牌库或统帅区中，由你操控的地便具有「{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。」

trans-unit.source: Brago's Representative
trans-unit.target: 布莱戈的代表

trans-unit.resname: CNS·14 | Brago's Representative | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: While voting, you get an additional vote. (The votes can be for different choices or for the same choice.)
trans-unit.target: 投票时你可以额外多投票一次。（可以投票选择不同的选项或相同的选项。）

trans-unit.source: On Fiora, no matter is settled until King Brago offers an opinion.
trans-unit.target: 在布莱戈国王表态之前，翡欧拉境内诸般事物均不算有定论。

trans-unit.source: Council Guardian
trans-unit.target: 议会守护者

trans-unit.resname: CNS·15 | Council Guardian | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Will of the council — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for blue, black, red, or green. CARDNAME gains protection from each color with the most votes or tied for most votes.
trans-unit.target: 议定～当CARDNAME进战场时，由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「蓝色」、「黑色」、「红色」或「绿色」。CARDNAME获得票数最多或与他者同为最多的所有颜色之反色保护异能。

trans-unit.source: Council's Judgment
trans-unit.target: 众议裁定

trans-unit.resname: CNS·16 | Council's Judgment | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Will of the council — Starting with you, each player votes for a nonland permanent you don't control. Exile each permanent with the most votes or tied for most votes.
trans-unit.target: 议定～由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择一个不由你操控的非地永久物。放逐票数最多或与他者同为最多的所有永久物。

trans-unit.source: When its power is threatened, the council speaks with a unified voice.
trans-unit.target: 当议会威权受到挑战时，其间众口会以同声回敬。

trans-unit.source: Custodi Soulbinders
trans-unit.target: 缚灵柩护

trans-unit.resname: CNS·17 | Custodi Soulbinders | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of other creatures on the battlefield.\n{2}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME: Put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物，X为战场上其他生物的数量。 {2}{W}，从CARDNAME上移去一个+1/+1指示物：将一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: Custodi Squire
trans-unit.target: 柩护扈从

trans-unit.resname: CNS·18 | Custodi Squire | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWill of the council — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for an artifact, creature, or enchantment card in your graveyard. Return each card with the most votes or tied for most votes to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 议定～当CARDNAME进战场时，由你开始，每位牌手各从你坟墓场投票选择一张神器、生物或结界牌。将票数最多或与他者同为最多的所有牌移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·19 | Rousing of Souls | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rousing of Souls
trans-unit.target: 扰醒灵魂

trans-unit.resname: CNS·19 | Rousing of Souls | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Parley — Each player reveals the top card of his or her library. For each nonland card revealed this way, you put a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying onto the battlefield. Then each player draws a card.
trans-unit.target: 论争～每位牌手各展示其牌库顶牌。每以此法展示出一张非地牌，你便将一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物放进战场。然后每位牌手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·19 | Rousing of Souls | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We remember. We rise."
trans-unit.target: 「我们铭记。我们起身。」

trans-unit.source: Academy Elite
trans-unit.target: 学院精英

trans-unit.resname: CNS·20 | Academy Elite | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in all graveyards.\n{2}{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME: Draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物，X为所有坟墓场中瞬间牌和法术牌的数量加总。 {2}{U}，从CARDNAME上移去一个+1/+1指示物：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Marchesa's Emissary
trans-unit.target: 玛切莎的密使

trans-unit.resname: CNS·21 | Marchesa's Emissary | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)\nDethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 辟邪（此生物不能成为由对手所操控之咒语或异能的目标。） 义勇（每当此生物攻击生命最多或与他者同为最多的牌手时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.source: "The Black Rose doesn't tolerate weeds."
trans-unit.target: 「黑蔷薇对废物绝不宽贷。」

trans-unit.source: Marchesa's Infiltrator
trans-unit.target: 玛切莎的渗透者

trans-unit.resname: CNS·22 | Marchesa's Infiltrator | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 义勇（每当此生物攻击生命最多或与他者同为最多的牌手时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。） 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Secrets, like coins, are easy to steal."
trans-unit.target: 「刺探情报就如窃取钱币一般易如反掌。」

trans-unit.resname: CNS·23 | Muzzio, Visionary Architect | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Muzzio, Visionary Architect
trans-unit.target: 创见构念师穆奇奥

trans-unit.resname: CNS·23 | Muzzio, Visionary Architect | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}{U}, {T}: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the highest converted mana cost among artifacts you control. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: {3}{U}，{T}：检视你牌库顶的X张牌，X为由你操控的神器间最高之总法术力费用。你可以展示其中的一张神器牌，并将它放进战场。将其余的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·24 | Plea for Power | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Plea for Power
trans-unit.target: 祈求权力

trans-unit.resname: CNS·24 | Plea for Power | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Will of the council — Starting with you, each player votes for time or knowledge. If time gets more votes, take an extra turn after this one. If knowledge gets more votes or the vote is tied, draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 议定～由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「时间」或「知识」。如果时间票数较多，则在本回合后进行额外的一个回合。如果知识票数较多或两者同为最多，则抓三张牌。

trans-unit.source: Split Decision
trans-unit.target: 两难决定

trans-unit.resname: CNS·25 | Split Decision | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Will of the council — Choose target instant or sorcery spell. Starting with you, each player votes for denial or duplication. If denial gets more votes, counter the spell. If duplication gets more votes or the vote is tied, copy the spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
trans-unit.target: 议定～选择目标瞬间或法术咒语。由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「拒斥」或「重制」。如果拒斥票数较多，则反击该咒语。如果重制票数较多或两者同为最多，则复制该咒语。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·26 | Bite of the Black Rose | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bite of the Black Rose
trans-unit.target: 黑蔷薇之刺

trans-unit.resname: CNS·26 | Bite of the Black Rose | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Will of the council — Starting with you, each player votes for sickness or psychosis. If sickness gets more votes, creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn. If psychosis gets more votes or the vote is tied, each opponent discards two cards.
trans-unit.target: 议定～由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「染疾」或「癫狂」。如果染疾票数较多，则由对手操控的生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。如果癫狂票数较多或两者同为最多，则每位对手各弃两张牌。

trans-unit.source: Drakestown Forgotten
trans-unit.target: 垂克镇遭忘者

trans-unit.resname: CNS·27 | Drakestown Forgotten | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of creature cards in all graveyards.\n{2}{B}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物，X为所有坟墓场中生物牌的数量。 {2}{B}，从CARDNAME上移去一个+1/+1指示物：目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Grudge Keeper
trans-unit.target: 铭怨师

trans-unit.resname: CNS·28 | Grudge Keeper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever players finish voting, each opponent who voted for a choice you didn't vote for loses 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当所有牌手完成投票时，每位投票选择了你未投票之选项的对手各失去2点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Your defiance is noted."
trans-unit.target: 「你的反抗已记录在案。」

trans-unit.resname: CNS·29 | Reign of the Pit | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reign of the Pit
trans-unit.target: 深渊统治

trans-unit.resname: CNS·29 | Reign of the Pit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player sacrifices a creature. Put an X/X black Demon creature token with flying onto the battlefield, where X is the total power of the creatures sacrificed this way.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各牺牲一个生物。将一个X/X黑色，具飞行异能的恶魔衍生生物放进战场，X为以此法牺牲之生物的力量总和。

trans-unit.source: Tyrant's Choice
trans-unit.target: 暴君抉择

trans-unit.resname: CNS·30 | Tyrant's Choice | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Will of the council — Starting with you, each player votes for death or torture. If death gets more votes, each opponent sacrifices a creature. If torture gets more votes or the vote is tied, each opponent loses 4 life.
trans-unit.target: 议定～由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「死亡」或「折磨」。如果死亡票数较多，则每位对手各牺牲一个生物。如果折磨票数较多或两者同为最多，则每位对手各失去4点生命。

trans-unit.source: Enraged Revolutionary
trans-unit.target: 盛怒革命者

trans-unit.resname: CNS·31 | Enraged Revolutionary | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 义勇（每当此生物攻击生命最多或与他者同为最多的牌手时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.source: When every right is voted away, only rage remains.
trans-unit.target: 所有权利均被票选褫夺，唯存满腔怒火。

trans-unit.source: Grenzo's Cutthroat
trans-unit.target: 格伦佐的割喉客

trans-unit.resname: CNS·32 | Grenzo's Cutthroat | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike\nDethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 先攻 义勇（每当此生物攻击生命最多或与他者同为最多的牌手时，在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.source: "Their guards are soft, ready to welcome a sharp dagger."
trans-unit.target: 「他们的守卫懒散松懈，直教人想用锋利匕首捅上一刀。」

trans-unit.source: Grenzo's Rebuttal
trans-unit.target: 格伦佐的抗辩

trans-unit.resname: CNS·33 | Grenzo's Rebuttal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put a 4/4 red Ogre creature token onto the battlefield. Starting with you, each player chooses an artifact, a creature, and a land from among the permanents controlled by the player to his or her left. Destroy each permanent chosen this way.
trans-unit.target: 将一个4/4红色食人魔衍生生物放进战场。由你开始，每位牌手各从由其左手边牌手操控的永久物之中选择一个神器、一个生物和一个地。消灭所有该些永久物。

trans-unit.source: Ignition Team
trans-unit.target: 纵火队

trans-unit.resname: CNS·34 | Ignition Team | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of tapped lands on the battlefield.\n{2}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME: Target land becomes a 4/4 red Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有X个+1/+1指示物，X为战场上已横置之地的数量。 {2}{R}，从CARDNAME上移去一个+1/+1指示物：目标地成为4/4红色元素生物直到回合结束。它仍然是地。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·35 | Scourge of the Throne | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Scourge of the Throne

trans-unit.source: Flying\nIslandcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for an Island card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 循环海岛{2}（{2}，弃掉此牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张海岛牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。）

trans-unit.source: Stasis Cell
trans-unit.target: 静态牢笼

trans-unit.resname: CNS·107 | Stasis Cell | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.\n{3}{U}: Attach CARDNAME to target creature.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。 {3}{U}：将CARDNAME结附在目标生物上。

trans-unit.source: The Simic created the cells to preserve their experiments. The Azorius put the cells to use on the guilty.
trans-unit.target: 析米克的成员制造此种牢笼，好用来保存实验品。俄佐立的成员则用牢笼来监禁罪犯。

trans-unit.source: Stifle
trans-unit.target: 阻抑

trans-unit.source: Counter target activated or triggered ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
trans-unit.target: 反击目标起动式或触发式异能。（法术力异能无法成为其目标。）

trans-unit.source: "Superior force meets woefully inadequate object. What paradox were you expecting?"\n—Azguri, archmage of Evos Isle
trans-unit.target: 「强劲力道遇上微渺物件。你觉得会产生怎样的吊诡？」 ～伊弗斯岛大法术师厄齐桂

trans-unit.source: Traveler's Cloak
trans-unit.target: 旅人斗篷

trans-unit.source:
Enchant creature
As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a land type.
When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature has landwalk of the chosen type.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种地类别。 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓一张牌。 所结附的生物具有该类别的地行者异能。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·110 | Turn the Tide | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 扭转局势

trans-unit.source: Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 由对手操控的生物得-2/-0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·110 | Turn the Tide | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Let their mindless armies come and face the might of genius."\n—Varil, Neurok partisan
trans-unit.target: 「教他们没有心智的部队放马过来，尝尝智者的厉害。」 ～纽若克游击队员帆利

trans-unit.source: Wind Dancer
trans-unit.target: 风舞者

trans-unit.source: Flying\n{T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {T}：目标生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Take my hand and dance to the music of the winds."
trans-unit.target: 「牵上我的手，踏着风鸣节拍一同起舞。」

trans-unit.source: Altar's Reap
trans-unit.target: 祭坛夺命

trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast CARDNAME, sacrifice a creature.\nDraw two cards.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为施放CARDNAME的额外费用。 抓两张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Don't worry, your death will be as informative as possible."\n—Gorghul, augur of skulls
trans-unit.target: 「别担心，我们会尽力从你的死亡取得大量情报。」 ～颅骨卜算师苟古

trans-unit.source: Assassinate
trans-unit.target: 行刺

trans-unit.source: Destroy target tapped creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标已横置的生物。

trans-unit.source: "This is how wars are won—not with armies of soldiers but with a single knife blade, artfully placed."\n—Yurin, royal assassin
trans-unit.target: 「战争就是这样赢的～不需兵士千万，只消刀锋一舞。」 ～皇家刺客尤霖

trans-unit.source: Ill-Gotten Gains
trans-unit.target: 不当之利

trans-unit.resname: CNS·114 | Ill-Gotten Gains | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile CARDNAME. Each player discards his or her hand, then returns up to three cards from his or her graveyard to his or her hand.
trans-unit.target: 放逐CARDNAME。每位牌手各弃掉其手牌，然后将至多三张牌从其坟墓场移回其手上。

trans-unit.source: Urza thought it a crusade. Xantcha knew it was a robbery.
trans-unit.target: 克撒以为那是正义之军，珊迦知道那是抢劫。

trans-unit.source: Infectious Horror
trans-unit.target: 播疫惊惧兽

trans-unit.resname: CNS·115 | Infectious Horror | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, each opponent loses 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，每位对手各失去2点生命。

trans-unit.source: Not once in the history of Grixis has anyone died of old age.
trans-unit.target: 有史以来，格利极从没人因衰老而过世。

trans-unit.source: Liliana's Specter
trans-unit.target: 莉莲娜仆幽灵

trans-unit.resname: CNS·116 | Liliana's Specter | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，每位对手各弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "The finest minions know what I need without me ever saying a thing."\n—Liliana Vess
trans-unit.target: 「最优秀的仆从不需我动口，就知道我要什么。」 ～莉莲娜维斯

trans-unit.resname: CNS·117 | Magus of the Mirror | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Magus of the Mirror
trans-unit.target: 崇镜贤者

trans-unit.resname: CNS·117 | Magus of the Mirror | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Exchange life totals with target opponent. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：与目标对手交换总生命。你只可以于你的维持中起动此异能。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·117 | Magus of the Mirror | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Behold! The image of the enemy and all that she has. Trust your envy, and take it."
trans-unit.target: 「看好了！这是敌人的样子，以及她拥有的东西。依妒忌行事，全部接收下来吧。」

trans-unit.source: Morkrut Banshee
trans-unit.target: 穆坎女妖

trans-unit.resname: CNS·118 | Morkrut Banshee | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Morbid — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 丧心～当CARDNAME进战场时，若本回合有生物死去，则目标生物得-4/-4直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Let go your grudges, or risk wandering the bogs forever in a murderous rage."\n—Hildin, priest of Avacyn
trans-unit.target: 「抛弃你的嫌隙，否则小心会落入抱着恨意永远在沼地徘徊的地步。」 ～艾维欣僧侣西汀

trans-unit.source: Necromantic Thirst
trans-unit.target: 死灵式渴求

trans-unit.resname: CNS·120 | Phage the Untouchable | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Phage the Untouchable
trans-unit.target: 不可近的菲姬

trans-unit.resname: CNS·120 | Phage the Untouchable | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you didn't cast it from your hand, you lose the game.\nWhenever Phage deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.\nWhenever Phage deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若你并非从你手上施放之，你输掉这盘游戏。 每当菲姬对任一生物造成战斗伤害时，消灭该生物。它不能重生。 每当菲姬对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手输掉这盘游戏。

trans-unit.source: Plagued Rusalka
trans-unit.target: 病殁怨魂

trans-unit.source: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {B}，牺牲一个生物：目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Look at her, once filled with innocence. Death has a way of wringing away such . . . deficiencies."\n—Savra
trans-unit.target: 「瞧瞧她，曾是如此无邪。死亡最在行的，就是挤干这种...缺陷。」 ～撒芙儿

trans-unit.target: 湿沼吸血鬼

trans-unit.target: 多重增幅{1}{B}（你施放此咒语时可以任意次数地额外支付{1}{B}。） 沼泽行者 CARDNAME进战场时上面有数个+1/+1指示物，其数量为它增幅过的次数。

trans-unit.source: Reckless Spite
trans-unit.target: 鲁莽恶行

trans-unit.resname: CNS·123 | Reckless Spite | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.
trans-unit.target: 消灭两个目标非黑色的生物。你失去5点生命。

trans-unit.source: "The end is justified in being mean. Or something like that."
trans-unit.target: 「为达目的，宁愿卑劣；或更等而下之。」

trans-unit.source: Skeletal Scrying
trans-unit.target: 骸骨占卜

trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast CARDNAME, exile X cards from your graveyard.\nYou draw X cards and you lose X life.
trans-unit.target: 从你坟墓场中放逐X张牌，以作为施放CARDNAME的额外费用。 你抓X张牌并失去X点生命。

trans-unit.source: His family was a small price to pay for the dark gifts that called to him.
trans-unit.target: 家族遗骨不过是他召使这股黑暗赋力的小小代价。

trans-unit.source: Smallpox
trans-unit.target: 小片毒疹

trans-unit.source: Each player loses 1 life, discards a card, sacrifices a creature, then sacrifices a land.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手失去1点生命，弃一张牌，牺牲一个生物，然后牺牲一个地。

trans-unit.source: Take away a few things, and a rebellion may ensue. Take away everything, and the oppression will be accepted as fate.
trans-unit.target: 夺走一些东西，有可能激起反抗。夺走一切东西，受压迫者会认命。

trans-unit.source: Stronghold Discipline
trans-unit.target: 城塞纪律

trans-unit.resname: CNS·126 | Stronghold Discipline | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player loses 1 life for each creature he or she controls.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各失去若干生命，其数量等同于他所操控的生物数量。

trans-unit.source: In Urborg, the instigators of each new rebellion are soaked in the blood of the last.
trans-unit.target: 在乌尔博格，每场叛乱的煽动者身上都沾满前次叛乱者的鲜血。

trans-unit.source: Syphon Soul
trans-unit.target: 吸魂

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对每位其他牌手各造成2点伤害。你获得等同于以此法所造成的伤害之生命。

trans-unit.source: As Phage drank their energy, a vague memory of Jeska stirred. Then she lost herself again in the joy of her victims' suffering.
trans-unit.target: 当菲姬畅饮他们的能量时，属于洁丝卡的遥远记忆轻颤了一下。而后受害者苦痛带来的欢愉让她再度浸溺其间。

trans-unit.source: Tragic Slip
trans-unit.target: 悲剧失足

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.\nMorbid — That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。 丧心～如果本回合有生物死去，则改为该生物得-13/-13直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Linger on death's door and risk being invited in.
trans-unit.target: 若徘徊于死亡门口，小心会给请进去。

trans-unit.source: Twisted Abomination
trans-unit.target: 曲恶憎恨兽

trans-unit.resname: CNS·129 | Twisted Abomination | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {B}: Regenerate CARDNAME.\nSwampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)
trans-unit.target: {B}：重生CARDNAME。 循环沼泽{2}（{2}，弃掉此牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张沼泽牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。）

trans-unit.source: Typhoid Rats
trans-unit.target: 伤寒鼠

trans-unit.source: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
trans-unit.target: 死触（它对生物造成的任何数量伤害都足以消灭后者。）

trans-unit.source: Kidnappers caught in Havengul are given two choices: languish in prison or become rat catchers. The smart ones go to prison.
trans-unit.target: 在海温古被捕的绑架犯有两条路可选：在牢里关上多年，或是去当捕鼠人。聪明的就会选择进牢。

trans-unit.source: Unhallowed Pact
trans-unit.target: 孽物契约

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nWhen enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 当所结附的生物死去时，将该牌在你的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.source: Agreements with demons seldom end at the grave.
trans-unit.target: 与恶魔签订的契约鲜少终结于坟墓。

trans-unit.source: Vampire Hexmage
trans-unit.target: 邪术吸血鬼

trans-unit.source: First strike\nSacrifice CARDNAME: Remove all counters from target permanent.
trans-unit.target: 先攻 牺牲CARDNAME：移去目标永久物上的所有指示物。

trans-unit.source: When the blood hunt lost its thrill, she looked for less tangible means of domination.
trans-unit.target: 当鲜血狩猎失去了刺激感，她便开始寻求不那么具象的支配方式。

trans-unit.source: Victimize
trans-unit.target: 生体活祭

trans-unit.source: Choose two target creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return the chosen cards to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 选择两张目标在你坟墓场中的生物牌。牺牲一个生物。如果你如此作，则将所选择的牌横置移回战场。

trans-unit.source: "Die. But die knowing that your pathetic life will yield a great bounty for me."\n—Zul Ashur, lich lord
trans-unit.target: 「去死吧。知道你这悲惨的一生能为我换回莫大回报，你也死得明白。」 ～巫妖领主祝亚许

trans-unit.source: Wakedancer
trans-unit.target: 醒夜舞者

trans-unit.source: Morbid — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if a creature died this turn, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 丧心～当CARDNAME进战场时，若本回合有生物死去，将一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: Hers is an ancient form of necromancy, steeped in shamanic trance and ritual that few skaberen or ghoulcallers comprehend.
trans-unit.target: 她运用死灵术的古老形式，其间的祭师出神与仪式超出多数尸嵌家或尸鬼牧者的理解能力。

trans-unit.source: Zombie Goliath
trans-unit.target: 巨硕灵俑

trans-unit.source: "Removing the encumbrance of useless brain tissue grants several advantages: a slight increase in mobility, a response of revulsion and horror from the enemy, and, in the case of large specimens, room for passengers."\n—Zul Ashur, lich lord
trans-unit.target: 「把无用又占空间的脑部组织拿掉，能带来些好处：移动力略增，让敌人感到嫌恶与恐惧，并且若是大型样本，还能搭载乘员。」 ～巫妖领主祝亚许

trans-unit.source: Barbed Shocker
trans-unit.target: 带刺电击虫

trans-unit.resname: CNS·136 | Barbed Shocker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample, haste\nWhenever CARDNAME deals damage to a player, that player discards all the cards in his or her hand, then draws that many cards.
trans-unit.target: 践踏，敏捷 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成伤害时，该牌手弃掉所有手牌，然后抓等量的牌。

trans-unit.source: Fervid shamans willingly submit to shockers in hopes of glimpsing the fortunes of the future.
trans-unit.target: 一些热情祭师自愿让电击虫螫刺，希望能藉此瞥视未来运势。

trans-unit.source: Boldwyr Intimidator
trans-unit.target: 波维尔凶汉

trans-unit.resname: CNS·137 | Boldwyr Intimidator | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Cowards can't block Warriors.\n{R}: Target creature becomes a Coward until end of turn.\n{2}{R}: Target creature becomes a Warrior until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 懦夫不能阻挡战士。 {R}：目标生物成为懦夫直到回合结束。 {2}{R}：目标生物成为战士直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Now everyone knows what you are."
trans-unit.target: 「现在大家都知道你算个啥了。」

trans-unit.source: Brimstone Volley
trans-unit.target: 硫磺射击

trans-unit.resname: CNS·138 | Brimstone Volley | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to target creature or player.\nMorbid — CARDNAME deals 5 damage to that creature or player instead if a creature died this turn.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物或牌手造成3点伤害。 丧心～如果本回合有生物死去，则改为CARDNAME对该目标生物或牌手造成5点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Chartooth Cougar
trans-unit.target: 乌牙山狮

trans-unit.resname: CNS·139 | Chartooth Cougar | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {R}: CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn.\nMountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)
trans-unit.target: {R}：CARDNAME得+1/+0直到回合结束。 循环山脉{2}（{2}，弃掉此牌：从你的牌库中搜寻一张山脉牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。）

trans-unit.source: Cinder Wall
trans-unit.target: 煤墙

trans-unit.resname: CNS·140 | Cinder Wall | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Defender\nWhen CARDNAME blocks, destroy it at end of combat.
trans-unit.target: 守军 当CARDNAME进行阻挡，在战斗结束时将其消灭。

trans-unit.source: "The smell of roasted flesh hung over the valley for hours."\n—Onean sergeant
trans-unit.target: 「皮肉烤熟的味道在山谷间飘荡了好几个小时。」 ～欧尼亚士官

trans-unit.source: Deathforge Shaman
trans-unit.target: 锻亡祭师

trans-unit.resname: CNS·141 | Deathforge Shaman | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Multikicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} any number of times as you cast this spell.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target player equal to twice the number of times it was kicked.
trans-unit.target: 多重增幅{R}（你施放此咒语时可以任意次数地额外支付{R}。） 当CARDNAME进战场时，它对目标牌手造成伤害，其数量等同于它已增幅次数的两倍。

trans-unit.source: Flaring Flame-Kin
trans-unit.target: 火光炎身

trans-unit.resname: CNS·142 | Flaring Flame-Kin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as CARDNAME is enchanted, it gets +2/+2, has trample, and has "{R}: CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
trans-unit.target: 只要CARDNAME上面结附了灵气，它便得+2/+2，具有践踏异能，且具有「{R}：CARDNAME得+1/+0直到回合结束。」

trans-unit.source: A flame-kin is always formidable, but feeding its fire with a sorcerous gift grants it the power to devastate armies.
trans-unit.target: 炎身十分强悍，而若为其添加术法火焰，就更使其万夫莫敌。

trans-unit.source: Flowstone Blade
trans-unit.target: 液石剑

trans-unit.resname: CNS·143 | Flowstone Blade | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\n{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 {R}：所结附的生物得+1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Remember the fable of the elf who came upon a cave of gold. In trying to free the largest piece, she was crushed by its weight."\n—Karn
trans-unit.target: 「记住那个妖精进山洞挖金块的寓言。她想带走最大的一块，结果却因为过重而摔死了。」 ～卡恩

trans-unit.resname: CNS·183 | Wrap in Vigor | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 活力覆庇

trans-unit.resname: CNS·183 | Wrap in Vigor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Regenerate each creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 重生每个由你操控的生物。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·183 | Wrap in Vigor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Some nature mages unknowingly took advantage of the temporal energies still swirling on Dominaria. What they mistook for healing magic was in fact the manipulation of time.
trans-unit.target: 有些自然法师无意间受到多明纳里亚暂时盘桓的能量之眷顾。他们以为这是医疗法术，实际上却是操作时间的技巧。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·184 | Basandra, Battle Seraph | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Basandra, Battle Seraph
trans-unit.target: 战斗炽天使芭珊卓

trans-unit.resname: CNS·184 | Basandra, Battle Seraph | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nPlayers can't cast spells during combat.\n{R}: Target creature attacks this turn if able.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 牌手在战斗中不能施放咒语。 {R}：目标生物本回合若能攻击，则必须攻击。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·184 | Basandra, Battle Seraph | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Why listen to the mumblings of wizards when the lash speaks true?"
trans-unit.target: 「既然鞭子能道出真相，又何必聆听法师的含糊话语？」

trans-unit.source: Decimate
trans-unit.target: 摧残

trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact, target creature, target enchantment, and target land.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器，目标生物，目标结界和目标地。

trans-unit.source: Anarchy comes in many forms: social, individual, Gruul . . .
trans-unit.target: 无政府状态有很多种形式：社会，个人，古鲁...

trans-unit.source: Dimir Doppelganger
trans-unit.target: 底密尔化妖

trans-unit.resname: CNS·186 | Dimir Doppelganger | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{U}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. CARDNAME becomes a copy of that card and gains this ability.
trans-unit.target: {1}{U}{B}：将目标生物牌从坟墓场放逐。CARDNAME成为该牌的复制品，并获得此异能。

trans-unit.source: "Fear not. Your life will not go unlived."
trans-unit.target: 「别怕。你的一生并没白活。」

trans-unit.resname: CNS·187 | Edric, Spymaster of Trest | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Edric, Spymaster of Trest
trans-unit.target: 崔斯特密探长埃卓克

trans-unit.resname: CNS·187 | Edric, Spymaster of Trest | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature deals combat damage to one of your opponents, its controller may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物向你的任一对手造成战斗伤害时，其操控者可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·187 | Edric, Spymaster of Trest | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I am not at liberty to reveal my sources, but I can assure you, the price on your head is high."
trans-unit.target: 「虽然我不能透露情报来源，但可以向你保证的是，你的脑袋很值钱。」

trans-unit.resname: CNS·188 | Fires of Yavimaya | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fires of Yavimaya
trans-unit.target: 亚维马雅之火

trans-unit.resname: CNS·188 | Fires of Yavimaya | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control have haste.\nSacrifice CARDNAME: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物具有敏捷异能。 牺牲CARDNAME：目标生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·188 | Fires of Yavimaya | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Yavimaya lights the quickest path to battle.
trans-unit.target: 亚维马雅照亮了通往战斗的捷径。

trans-unit.source: Mirari's Wake
trans-unit.target: 映奇宝珠的余韵

trans-unit.resname: CNS·189 | Mirari's Wake | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +1/+1.\nWhenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana to your mana pool of any type that land produced.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物得+1/+1。 每当你横置一个地以产生法术力时，加一点该地已产生的类别之法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: The land drank power from the Mirari as though it had thirsted forever.
trans-unit.target: 大地暴烈地自宝珠汲取能量，仿佛亘古以来便未进滴水。

trans-unit.source: Mortify
trans-unit.target: 羞愧

trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature or enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物或结界。

trans-unit.source: Many who cross Sorin's path come down with a sudden and fatal case of being-in-the-way-of-a-millennia-old-vampire.
trans-unit.target: 许多让索霖碍事的人，很快就有了遇上千年吸血鬼注定的结局。

trans-unit.source: Pernicious Deed
trans-unit.target: 毒契

trans-unit.resname: CNS·191 | Pernicious Deed | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {X}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with converted mana cost X or less.
trans-unit.target: {X}，牺牲CARDNAME：消灭所有总法术力费用等于或小于X的神器、生物和结界。

trans-unit.source: "Yawgmoth," Freyalise whispered as she set the bomb, "now you will pay for your treachery."
trans-unit.target: 「约格莫夫，」妃雅丽兹设定炸弹时轻轻地说：「现在你将为自己的背信忘义付出代价。」

trans-unit.source: Sky Spirit
trans-unit.target: 天空精怪

trans-unit.resname: CNS·192 | Sky Spirit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, first strike
trans-unit.target: 飞行，先攻

trans-unit.source: "Like a strain of music: easy to remember but impossible to catch."\n—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*
trans-unit.target: 「她就像缕缕乐音般，易留于人心却无法触及。」 ～晴空号的米丽

trans-unit.source: Spiritmonger
trans-unit.target: 心灵贩子

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.\n{B}: Regenerate CARDNAME.\n{G}: CARDNAME becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一生物造成伤害时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 {B}：重生CARDNAME。 {G}：选择一种颜色，CARDNAME成为该色直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Spontaneous Combustion
trans-unit.target: 生体自燃

trans-unit.resname: CNS·194 | Spontaneous Combustion | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast CARDNAME, sacrifice a creature.\nCARDNAME deals 3 damage to each creature.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为施放CARDNAME的额外费用。 CARDNAME对每个生物各造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Heat of battle" is usually a metaphor.
trans-unit.target: 「如火如荼」通常是种隐喻。

trans-unit.source: Wood Sage
trans-unit.target: 树木贤哲

trans-unit.resname: CNS·195 | Wood Sage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Name a creature card. Reveal the top four cards of your library and put all of them with that name into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: {T}：说出一个生物牌的名称。展示你牌库顶的四张牌，并将其中所有该名称的牌置于你手上。将其余的牌置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·196 | Altar of Dementia | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Altar of Dementia
trans-unit.target: 痴呆祭坛

trans-unit.resname: CNS·196 | Altar of Dementia | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a creature: Target player puts a number of cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物：目标牌手将其牌库顶若干牌置入其坟墓场，其数量等同于所牺牲之生物的力量。

trans-unit.resname: CNS·196 | Altar of Dementia | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It is not that you will go mad. It is that you will beg for madness."\n—Volrath
trans-unit.target: 「这不是说你将要疯狂，而是你会盼望发狂。」 ～瓦拉司

trans-unit.source: Deathrender
trans-unit.target: 归魂剑

trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+2.\nWhenever equipped creature dies, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield and attach CARDNAME to it.\nEquip {2}
Explorer's Scope
trans-unit.target: 探险家望远镜

trans-unit.resname: CNS·198 | Explorer's Scope | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever equipped creature attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped.\nEquip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 每当佩带此武具的生物攻击时，检视你的牌库顶牌。若该牌是地牌，你可以将它横置进战场。 佩带{1}（{1}：装备在由你操控的目标生物上。佩带的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: Fireshrieker
trans-unit.target: 鸣火杖

trans-unit.source: Equipped creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)\nEquip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物具有连击异能。（它能造成先攻与普通战斗伤害。） 佩带{2}（{2}：装备在目标由你操控的生物上。佩带的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: Galvanic Juggernaut
trans-unit.target: 电流攻城巨车

trans-unit.resname: CNS·200 | Galvanic Juggernaut | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME attacks each turn if able.\nCARDNAME doesn't untap during your untap step.\nWhenever another creature dies, untap CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME每回合若能攻击，则必须攻击。 CARDNAME于你的重置步骤中不能重置。 每当另一个生物死去时，重置CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Peace Strider
trans-unit.target: 和平神行客

trans-unit.resname: CNS·201 | Peace Strider | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.source: "The Vanished must have sent it from beyond to aid us in this struggle."\n—Kessla, Sylvok shaman
trans-unit.target: 「这必定是消失的一代从彼方送来，好助我们渡过此劫。」 ～希沃克祭师凯丝拉

trans-unit.source: Reito Lantern
trans-unit.target: 灵都宫灯

trans-unit.resname: CNS·202 | Reito Lantern | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: {3}：将目标牌从任一坟墓场置于其拥有者的牌库底。

trans-unit.source: Lanterns carved from the mystic stones of the Reito Mines were said to light the way of lost souls.
trans-unit.target: 据说以灵都矿脉出产之神秘石材刻成的宫灯，能够指引游魂明路。

trans-unit.source: Runed Servitor
trans-unit.target: 符文随侍

trans-unit.resname: CNS·203 | Runed Servitor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, each player draws a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，每位牌手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Scholars had puzzled for centuries over the ruins at Tal Terig. Its secrets had always lived within one rune-carved head.
trans-unit.target: 塔帖立遗迹让学者思索数百年却找不到解答。其秘密一直就躲在个刻着符文的头里面。

trans-unit.source: Silent Arbiter
trans-unit.target: 沉静仲裁者

trans-unit.resname: CNS·204 | Silent Arbiter | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: No more than one creature can attack each combat.\nNo more than one creature can block each combat.
trans-unit.target: 每次战斗中，进行攻击的生物不能多于一个。 每次战斗中，进行阻挡的生物不能多于一个。

trans-unit.source: Scholars say that arbiters exist on every world, created by an unknown hand to enforce justice.
trans-unit.target: 学者认为不知名的势力创造了仲裁者，以在每个世界奉行正义之道。

trans-unit.source: Spectral Searchlight
trans-unit.target: 光谱探照灯

trans-unit.resname: CNS·205 | Spectral Searchlight | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Choose a player. That player adds one mana of any color he or she chooses to his or her mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：选择一位牌手。该牌手加一点法术力到他的法术力池中，其颜色由他选择。

trans-unit.source: The first searchlights were given as gifts, symbols of cooperation, to the emissaries present at the signing of the Guildpact.
trans-unit.target: 第一批探照灯是赠送给前来签署十会盟的密使，象征着合作无间。

trans-unit.source: Vedalken Orrery
trans-unit.target: 维多肯星像仪

trans-unit.resname: CNS·206 | Vedalken Orrery | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may cast nonland cards as though they had flash.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将非地牌视同具有闪现异能地来施放。

trans-unit.source: The model incorporated the fifth sun effortlessly, as if it had always known.
trans-unit.target: 此模型将第五太阳顺势纳入，彷佛设计时早已预见。

trans-unit.source: Warmonger's Chariot
trans-unit.target: 战争贩子战车

trans-unit.resname: CNS·207 | Warmonger's Chariot | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+2.\nAs long as equipped creature has defender, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.\nEquip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+2/+2。 只要佩带此武具的生物具有守军异能，它能视同不具守军异能地进行攻击。 佩带{3}（{3}：装备在目标由你操控的生物上。佩带的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: The best defense is a good offense.
trans-unit.target: 最佳的防御就是有效的攻击。

trans-unit.source: Mirrodin's Core
trans-unit.target: 秘罗地核心

trans-unit.resname: CNS·208 | Mirrodin's Core | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{T}: Put a charge counter on CARDNAME.\n{T}, Remove a charge counter from CARDNAME: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {T}：在CARDNAME上放置一个充电指示物。 {T}，从CARDNAME上移去一个充电指示物：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Quicksand
trans-unit.target: 流沙

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Target attacking creature without flying gets -1/-2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：目标进行攻击、且不具飞行异能的生物得-1/-2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Not all deaths are etched with mythic meaning and iconic glory.
trans-unit.target: 并非所有死亡都刻划着神秘意义与莫大光荣。

trans-unit.source: Reflecting Pool
trans-unit.target: 映景明湖

trans-unit.resname: CNS·210 | Reflecting Pool | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add to your mana pool one mana of any type that a land you control could produce.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点法术力到你的法术力池中，其类别为由你操控的地能产生之任一类别。

trans-unit.source: Does it reflect the future that once was or the past that can never be?
trans-unit.target: 它会映照出曾经的未来，亦或不再的过往？
